amendment.description: Amendment adds Lake County, Illinois to the list in the bill of small projects for aquatic ecosystem restoration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 110-100 to add a new section at the end of title II. As modified the amendment inserts the following new projects in Lake County, Ilinois.

action.text: Kirk amendment (A005) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Kirk amendment as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
